findings.title: UniswapV3 TWAP oracle can be manipulated in low-liquidity pools
findings.description: Price oracle relies on single-block TWAP which can be manipulated

findings.title: Flash loan allows governance vote manipulation
findings.description: Governance votes can be inflated via flash-borrowed tokens

findings.title: Precision loss in reward calculation
findings.description: Division before multiplication causes precision loss in reward accrual

findings.title: Unchecked return value on token transfer
findings.description: Transfer return value not checked, silent failure possible
